kafka/bin/zookeeper-server-start.sh config/zookeeper.properties

kafka/bin/kafka-server-start.sh config/server.properties

kafka/bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic bitirme-activity

kafka/bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic bitirme-no-activity

kafka/bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --topic bitirme-input



## Topic Olu≈üturma
kafka/bin/kafka-topics.sh --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --create --topic my-topic --partitions 3 --replication-factor 1

## Topic Listeleme
kafka/bin/kafka-topics.sh --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --list

python3 dataframe_to_kafka.py --input "/home/selcuk/bitirme/test_df/data.csv" -t bitirme-input --excluded_cols 'pir_value' --sep ','

python3 streaming.py
